text: It ’ s not Thanksgiving, but Elizabeth Hurley is thankful nonetheless. The “ Austin Powers ” star spent her Easter Sunday with her nephew, Miles, who is still on the mend following his stabbing last month. “ Thanking God today that my nephew Miles is with us for Easter today, ” she wrote on Twitter. “ His wound is still oozing blood but he ’ s alive & we ’ re thankful. The knifemen who stabbed him are still roaming around London. Perhaps around your loved ones. Happy Easter xx ” Thanking God today that my nephew Miles is with us for Easter today.
